snippet: Stocks moved lower in afternoon trading and finished in the red for the second day in a row and uncertainty over Greece continued to weigh on investors.
abstract: Stocks drop due to investor concerns about stalled negotiations over Greek bailout.
lead_paragraph: Stocks moved lower in afternoon trading and finished in the red for the second day in a row and uncertainty over Greece continued to weigh on investors.

headline.main: Market Falls as Concern Rises Over Greece Debt Crisis
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall as Progress Eludes Talks in Greek Debt
